input_args.passage: 'Old-earth or young-earth belief | CMI takes the stand that the creation is thousands of years old, based on straightforward acceptance of the chronology in Genesis.'
input_args.claim: 'However, citation mentions that Answers in Genesis, an organization with a similar focus, sees evolution as incompatible with the Bible and views anything other than the young Earth view as a compromise on the principle of biblical inerrancy.'
